resources.string:
Me-lyric is an image-based lyric share app, combing the feature of the lyric sharing function from a Music Player and Image-editing function from an image share App. 

Developed by Tracy and Julie, 
as course project, as a start not an end. 

Any suggestion is welcome. 
Email us : xinyunch@connect.hku.hk / yeyaya@connect.hku.hk 

For all music lovers, for all image lovers 

Hope all of u could make the best match of touching words and amazing images. 

感謝永遠有歌 把心境道破 
哪論動或靜 誰也有情 情緒有它撫摸
